data.title: Michael C. Hall
data.text:
Born: 1-Feb-1971

Birthplace: Raleigh, NC

Gender: Male

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: David Fisher on Six Feet Under

Father: (d. circa 1982, cancer)

Wife: Amy Spanger (stage actress, m. 1-May-2002, div. 2006)

Wife: Jennifer Carpenter (his sister on Dexter, m. 31-Dec-2008, sep. 2010)

University: Earlham College, Richmond, IN (1993)

University: MFA, New York University

Golden Globe 2010, Best Actor for Dexter

Risk Factors: Lymphoma

TELEVISION

Dexter Dexter Morgan (2006-)

Six Feet Under David Fisher (gay brother, 2001-05)

FILMOGRAPHY AS ACTOR

Game Night (15-Feb-2018)

Mark Felt: The Man Who Brought Down the White House (8-Sep-2017)

Christine (23-Jan-2016)

Justice League: Gods and Monsters (22-Jul-2015) [VOICE]

Cold in July (18-Jan-2014)

Kill Your Darlings (18-Jan-2013)

The Trouble with Bliss (28-Apr-2011)

Peep World (15-Sep-2010) · Jack

Gamer (3-Sep-2009) · Ken Castle

Bereft (20-Oct-2004)

Paycheck (25-Dec-2003) · Agent Klein
